title: The San Antonio Spurs say French star Victor Wembanyama will likely miss the rest of the NBA season with deep vein thrombosis in his left shoulder | Billings News | kulr8.com
text:
The San Antonio Spurs say French star Victor Wembanyama will likely miss the rest of the NBA season with deep vein thrombosis in his left shoulder
- EZRA SHAW
- Updated
As featured on
San Antonio Spurs star Victor Wembanyama is expected to miss the rest of the NBA season after being diagnosed with deep vein thrombosis in his right shoulder, the team said Thursday.
